Package toDoLy

Class SaveFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • toDoLy.SaveFile
  • public class SaveFile
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class which contains the methods for writing the task to a file and reading the file output again into a list.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void arrayToOutput​(java.util.ArrayList<Task> list)
      This method prints into the CSV file that was created the content of the list as pre-formatted by the previous method.
      java.lang.String convertToCSV​(java.lang.String tasksToFile)
      Transforms the ArrayList into a string with the chosen delimiter ",".
      java.lang.String escapeSpecialCharacters​(java.lang.String data)
      This method is used to avoid writing characters like , \ ' as input and creating additional input fields for them.
      void readFile()
      This method reads the lines of input from the created CSV file and
      void saveToFile()
      saveToFile creates the file in which the ArrayList content is going to be written and also catches exception if file is not

      • convertToCSV

        public java.lang.String convertToCSV​(java.lang.String tasksToFile)
        Transforms the ArrayList into a string with the chosen delimiter ",".
        Parameters:
        tasksToFile - is the string created with the fields of the ArrayList
        Returns:
        the string of the tasks of the ArrayList without special characters

      • arrayToOutput

        public void arrayToOutput​(java.util.ArrayList<Task> list)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        This method prints into the CSV file that was created the content of the list as pre-formatted by the previous method.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • escapeSpecialCharacters

        public java.lang.String escapeSpecialCharacters​(java.lang.String data)
        This method is used to avoid writing characters like , \ ' as input and creating additional input fields for them.
        Parameters:
        data -
        Returns:
        returns the data after replacing them with space.
